sentence.Network_en: He sets the atmosphere and shapes the scenes pleasingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把气氛和场面调动得轻松愉快。

sentence.Network_en: The interior design is pleasingly simple.
sentence.Network_cn: 室内设计简约朴素，令人惬意。

sentence.Network_en: This last phrase was pitched to resonate pleasingly in the ears of the West.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后这句话在西方人那里得到了令人愉快的共鸣.

entry.tran: 令人愉快的；使人满意的
entry.def: Something that is pleasing gives you pleasure and satisfaction.

example.ex: This area of France has a pleasing climate in August...
example.tran: 法国的这一地区在8月份气候宜人。
